# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_enum_parser_bin
  TOOL_enum_parser_dependency
  tools/enum_parser/enum_parser
  enum_parser
)

add_library(minikql-jsonpath-parser)


target_compile_options(minikql-jsonpath-parser PRIVATE
  -DYDB_REWRAPPER_LIB_ID=kHyperscan
)

target_link_libraries(minikql-jsonpath-parser PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  contrib-libs-double-conversion
  library-cpp-json
  minikql-jsonpath-rewrapper
  jsonpath-rewrapper-re2
  essentials-public-issue
  yql-essentials-ast
  yql-essentials-utils
  core-issue-protos
  parser-proto_ast-antlr3
  proto_ast-gen-jsonpath
  tools-enum_parser-enum_serialization_runtime
)

target_sources(minikql-jsonpath-parser PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/minikql/jsonpath/parser/ast_builder.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/minikql/jsonpath/parser/ast_nodes.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/minikql/jsonpath/parser/binary.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/minikql/jsonpath/parser/parser.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/minikql/jsonpath/parser/parse_double.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/minikql/jsonpath/parser/type_check.cpp
)


generate_enum_serilization(minikql-jsonpath-parser
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yql/essentials/minikql/jsonpath/parser/ast_nodes.h
  INCLUDE_HEADERS
  yql/essentials/minikql/jsonpath/parser/ast_nodes.h
)
